description: Analyst and market news per sector. Run periodically: npm run fetch:sector-news

articles.title: Analysts stay constructive on Salesforce (CRM) despite sector weakness
articles.body: Salesforce Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is among the best machine learning stocks to buy according to analysts. In a February 3 report, The Fly reported that Piper Sandler analyst Billy Fitzsimmons cut the price target on Salesforce from $315 to $280 while maintaining an Outperform rating.

articles.title: AI fear grips Wall Street as a new stock market reality sets in
articles.body: AI startup Anthropic last week released new tools designed to automate work tasks, sparking fears that the innovations would doom businesses. In response, investors dumped a broad range of stocks.

articles.title: US software stocks slump as AI disruption fears take over
articles.body: By Shashwat Chauhan Jan 29 (Reuters) - U.S. software stocks fell on Thursday after SAP's underwhelming cloud outlook and a post-earnings slide in ServiceNow deepened concerns that traditional providers are being outpaced by artificial-intelligence players.
